page.title: 05Cycle Hire
page.content: A wide range of cycles can be hired from bases at Whitwell and Normanton. The whole family can be accomodated from six weeks old to grandparents. Every type of cycle is available from sports racers to tandems and tricycles and can be fitted with kiddie seats. Each party is given a small map of the area showing tracks and routes from 2 to 25 miles (the perimeter of Rutland Water). For the more energetic leaflets are also published by the Leicester County Council describing day rides in the area along quiet routes and lanes of the surrounding countryside and villages. On fine weekends and summer days many people park their cars, hire a cycle and enjoy the fresh air and beauty of Rutland Water.
